properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-39.94S 037-46.48W AND 04-37.57S 036-32.12W.
   B. 28 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-23.53S 037-49.93W AND 04-28.98S 036-15.64W.
   C. 29 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-55.91S 037-30.32W AND 04-39.36S 036-34.25W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 30 DEC 12.
